sentences.sContent: He may even be able to turn the need to economise to his advantage.
sentences.sContent_eng: He may even be able to turn the need to economise to his advantage.
sentences.sCn: 为了获得执政优势，他甚至可能会考虑节省开支。

sentences.sContent: Lack of access to information about demand and supply makes it difficult for both suppliers and traders to plan, economise and improve their activities.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lack of access to information about demand and supply makes it difficult for both suppliers and traders to plan, economise and improve their activities.
sentences.sCn: 缺乏供求信息将同时使得供应商和贸易商难以计划、节约和优化他们的经济活动。

words.tran: 节约装置；节约者；经济家
